selected_skills.name: identify_sequence_pattern
selected_skills.purpose: To identify the pattern or rule governing the sequence of numbers in the matrix.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to analyze the sequence of numbers in the matrix and determine the underlying pattern or rule.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer in the required format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to ensure the final answer is returned in the format: 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: select_correct_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To select the correct option that completes the matrix according to the identified pattern.
